text: Étienne Blanc (born 29 August 1954) is a French politician serving as First Vice President of the Regional Council of Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes since 2016. A member of The Republicans, he represented the third constituency of the Ain department in the National Assembly from 2002 to 2016. Blanc previously served as Mayor of Divonne-les-Bains from 1991 until 2019. Following the 2015 regional elections, Laurent Wauquiez was elected President of the Regional Council of Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes. He then appointed Blanc as Regional Council First Vice President. He was his party's candidate for Mayor of Lyon in the 2020 municipal election. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:People from Givors Category:Politicians from Auvergne-Rhône- Alpes Category:Union for a Popular Movement politicians Category:The Republicans (France) politicians Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 14th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies for Ain (French Fifth Republic) Category:Regional councillors of Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes
title: Étienne Blanc
